title: Denmark sets new organ donation record after policy shift [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Wider eligibility criteria for organ donations have led to a significant rise in transplants, with potential for additional improvements following a new 'opt-in' register
summary_public: Wider eligibility criteria for organ donations have led to a significant rise in transplants, with potential for additional improvements following a new 'opt-in' register
